name: Super! Pirate! Fight! Club! - Extreme Edition
name_original: Super! Pirate! Fight! Club! - Extreme Edition
description:
Entry for Mini Jam 28: Pirates. The limitation was "no water".

Fight endless waves of bad AI disguised as pirates!

Controls:

You move around your target using the arrow keys or WASD.
The game has a targeting feature, which means that you will always look towards a target. To swap target, use the SPACE key. 
Use your cutlass to perform a melee attack with Z or RIGHT CTRL.
You shoot your gun with X or RIGHT SHIFT. You can only shoot if your "gun gauge" is full. To fill the gun gauge, you must hit a target with a melee attack.

  • Movement: arrow keys or WASD keys.
  • Swap target: SPACE.
  • Melee attack: Z key or RIGHT CTRL.
  • Shoot gun: X key or RIGHT SHIFT.

Future:

I plan to add player vs. player after the game jam has ended. I had also planned to add item drops when you kill an enemy. If anyone have suggestions or have anything to say then feel free to make a comment.

Everything made my me, yay!
